attributes.additional_details: Because it will change the country completely and may save kids from thinking bad of themselves to doing something with their life
attributes.background: Kids over 12 should have the right to vote because most kids are maturer than adults and should have a separate kids vote 🗳

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what a "seperate kids vote" would be for, such as creating MPs only elected by children or contributing to the votes for MPs in the same way that other votes count. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
